Title: Pokémon the Movie: Kyurem vs. the Sword of Justice
Genre: Animation, Action, Adventure, Family, Fantasy, Sci-Fi
Writer: Hideki Sonoda (screenplay), Satoshi Tajiri (orginal concept), Junichi Masuda (original concept), Ken Sugimori (original concept)
Actors: Sarah Natochenny, Eileen Stevens, Jason Griffith, Vic Mignogna
Plot: An over zealous pokemon called Keldeo enrages a very powerful Kyurem, with the help of Ash and Pikachu can Keldeo become a sword of justice and defeat the mighty Kyurem?
